channel.title: Sterling Range – Medika Supplies
channel.description: Supply quality products to the medical industries

item.title: SEERS Sterling 2 Section Couch
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description: A simple 2 Section Couch, with an adjustable backrest for supporting the patient in a sitting position whilst being treated or examined. An optional breathing hole and plug can also be added for prone treatments. SterlingÂ 2 Section Couch - Model Choices SX2007 - Electric Elevation Download PDF
item.content:encoded:
Standard Model Specification

  • Safe working load and lifting capacity (from minimum height) of 200kgs (440lbs = 31.5 stone)
  • Power assisted backrest angle adjustment from -25 to +75 degrees
  • Excellent height range from 46-99cm (18 “- 39”)
  • 100mm diameter individual locking castors
  • Purpose made precision bearings on all pivot points
  • Clearance beneath frame for mobile hoist
  • Hand switch fitted as standard
  • Standard width of 63cm (24″)
  • Choice of upholstery colours available

Sterling Range Optional Couch Accessories

  • Breathing hole and plug
  • Single foot switch for electric models
  • Paper towel holder
  • Matching therapy chair or stool
  • Removable head/knee support
  • Stretch towelling covers

item.title: SEERS Sterling 3 Section Couch
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description: A simple 3 Section Couch, with an adjustable backrest and foot section for supporting the patient in a sitting position whilst being treated or examined. An optional breathing hole and plug can also be added for prone treatments. Sterling 3 Section Couch - Model Choices SX3008 - Electric Elevation Download PDF
item.content:encoded:
Standard Model Specification

  • Safe working load and lifting capacity (from minimum height) of 200kgs (440lbs = 31.5 stone)
  • Power assisted backrest angle adjustment from -25 to +75 degrees
  • Power assisted foot section angle adjustment from horizontal to +80 degrees
  • Excellent height range from 46-99cm (18 “- 39”)
  • 100mm diameter individual locking castors
  • Purpose made precision bearings on all pivot points
  • Clearance beneath frame for mobile hoist
  • Hand switch fitted as standard
  • Standard width of 63cm (24″)
  • Choice of upholstery colours available

Sterling Range Optional Couch Accessories

  • Breathing hole and plug
  • Single foot switch for electric models
  • Paper towel holder
  • Matching therapy chair or stool
  • Removable head/knee support
  • Stretch towelling covers
